column1: Papanasam (transl. Destruction of Sins) is a 2015 Indian Tamil-language drama thriller film directed by Jeethu Joseph
column2: a shot-for-shot remake of his 2013 Malayalam film Drishyam. The film was jointly produced by Suresh Balaje and Rajkumar Sethupathi. It stars Asha Sarath reprising her role from the original film and Kamal Haasan and Gautami portraying the respective roles played by Mohanlal and Meena in the original.
